title: Module Parameters: metadata_procedures_fetch
description: Fetches procedure(s) metadata for the subject from the configured metadata service and records results for downstream validation and record-keeping.

metadata_subject_id.description: Subject identifier to query. If omitted, modules often use the top-level subject_id.

metadata_mouse_id.description: Optional separate mouse identifier if your metadata system distinguishes it from subject_id.

metadata_procedures_timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for procedures fetch calls.
